definitions.definition: having a particular color or different colors

examples.text: The street was ablaze with colored lights.
She was wearing a cream-colored suit.
The words are written in a **different-colored** ink.
He uses ink and **colored pencils** in his drawings.

definitions.definition: a word used to describe a person who is not white, which is now considered offensive
(in South Africa) having parents who are of different races
